name: Lose Control
description:
Can you reach the victory flag 10 times? Lose Control is a frustratingly difficult platformer, with only one level but the controls change each time you reach the victory flag. Are you up for the challenge? 

Controls - 

W- Jump or Double Jump

 A- Move Left 

S - Fall through platforms

D - Move Right

R - Restart the level (but you stay with the same controls, doesn’t restart completely) 

Music - syncopika https://opengameart.org/content/happy-tune 

Art - Kenny Game Assets

The ‘incongruous’ part is the controls always being shown in the corner of the game, which sticks would stick out in most games. But, in this game, make sure to pay attention to it so you know how the controls change. In case it’s unclear, the letter replacing W will have the same function as W in the first level and in the description above.
